statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Now there is an image recognition problem for you. Now you are given an image which is a N * N matrix and there are only 0s and 1s in the matrix. And we are interested in the squares in whose four edges there is no 0s. So it��s your task to find how many such squares in the image.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line of the input contains an integer T (1<=T<=10) which means the number of test cases.
For each test cases, the first line is one integer N (1<=N<=1000) which is the size of the image. Then there are N lines and each line has N integers each of which is either 0 or 1.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, please output a line which is "Case X: Y", X means the number of the test case and Y means the number of the squares we are interested in in the image.
